headline: A Blow to National Pride Draws Mourning in Iran
abstract: The killing of the revered Iranian general “really wounded and insulted the national pride,” one resident said.
lead_paragraph: Huge crowds of mourners poured into the streets of two Iranian cities on Sunday to pay their respects to Maj. Gen. Qassim Suleimani, the second most powerful figure in the country and leader of the elite Quds force, who was killed on Friday in an American drone strike near the Baghdad airport.
